column5: Our beach condo is in a cozy, family friendly complex of 32 units. With convenient private beach access, gameroom, and heated pool the complex is easy to navigate and safe enough to let your older kids roam. Our private path to the boardwalk allows for cars to be parked at the end or is short enough to be walked if desired. This fully furnished condo has all you need for cooking and staying in your whole stay or is conveniently located to Port A and Corpus Christi for eating and entertainment.
